event: Scheduled events are either cancelled or postponed until further notice.
Please follow all CDC guidelines as well as city and Kentucky state government recommendations, and limit travel when possible.
The intersection of Ave of Champions at Rose St is currently CLOSED 24 hrs/day for major sanitary sewer line work.
Please see the map and complete details for traffic patterns and detours.
After this work is complete,  Ave of Champions will experience block-by-block full street closures between Limestone and Rose St.
